experiences.title: English Teacher
experiences.subtitle: Chungdahm Learning Institute, Daejeon, South Korea.
workDescription: Tracked student progress and used data to identify areas where the class was struggling, enabling targeted focus on specific skills and leading to significant improvements in overall performance.

Participated in meetings aimed at developing best practices for teaching methodologies, contributing data-driven insights and ideas that were instrumental in shaping curriculum development and instructional strategies.
Communicated complex information to diverse audiences, developing strong communication skills relevant to conveying data-driven insights to stakeholders.
Adapted lesson plans and addressed classroom challenges, demonstrating problem-solving skills and the ability to identify solutions through data analysis.

experiences.title: Assistant Manager - Hardlines
experiences.subtitle: Kmart, West Long Branch, NJ.
workDescription: Developed and executed merchandising plans to drive sales and improve customer experience.
Tracked inventory levels and optimized ordering process to ensure product availability and minimize waste.
Monitored cash flow and implemented controls to prevent losses and maintain financial integrity.
Hired, trained, and coordinated a team of 75+ associates, providing coaching and feedback to drive performance and foster a positive work culture.
Achieved top-performing metrics in customer satisfaction, sales, and productivity through effective leadership and collaboration with cross-functional teams.

experiences.title: Electronics Team Member
experiences.subtitle: Target, Brick, NJ.
workDescription: Leveraged my product knowledge and sales skills to consistently exceed sales targets and drive profitable revenue growth.
Managed street-dated merchandise, including entertainment and electronics, to ensure timely and efficient product launches.
Trained and mentored new team members to promote a positive and collaborative work environment.
